messages.msgSnippet: Subject: Sword Show Schedule Rough schedule for Sat and Sun. 8:30 dealers get in. 9:00 doors open to public. Lecture on Jutte by Ken Clark 1:00. Japanese sword
messages.messageBody:
Subject: Sword Show Schedule

Rough schedule for Sat and Sun.
8:30 dealers get in. 9:00 doors open to public. Lecture on Jutte by
Ken Clark 1:00. Japanese sword demo ate 2:00 by Orlando Toyama Ryu.
4:00 Kantei lecture and class taught by Joe Forcine. Show closes at
8:00.. Sunday morning; dealers in at 8:30 and general public at 9:00.
Bamboo cutting demo at 11:00 and Kantei contest. Timefor contest to be
determined later.
--
--Bob Elder
East Coast Martial Art Supplies Inc.
407-896-2487
http://ecmas.com
www.orlando-toyamaryu.com
www.orlandotaikai.com

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
